ðŸ“– Summary: Preswald is a Python framework that simplifies the creation and deployment of interactive data applications. It provides pre-built UI components and manages stateful execution using a DAG-based approach. With Preswald, users can easily turn Python scripts into shareable applications that can be deployed locally or in the cloud with a single command.
